name: affine
tagline: A collaborative workspace for notes, whiteboards, and structured content
description: AFFiNE is a collaborative, privacy-focused workspace that combines note-taking, whiteboarding, and database organization. It offers real-time sync, offline editing, and AI-assisted features, designed to be a self-hosted modern productivity tool.

features.title: Knowledge Workspace
features.description: Combines documents, notes, and databases in a single workspace

features.title: Block-Based Editor
features.description: Structures content using modular content blocks

features.title: Local-First Storage
features.description: Stores data locally with optional synchronization

features.title: Real-Time Collaboration
features.description: Supports multiple users editing shared content

features.title: Cross-Platform Support
features.description: Runs on desktop and web environments
